body_text: I think that this is null initially because by default the Preference Value is neither true nor false.
body:
I think that this is `null` initially because by default the Preference Value is neither true nor false.

![screen shot 2017-08-31 at 10 37 55 am](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1198628/29936859-82b6cace-8e38-11e7-9b3a-8dc2dd399b2a.png)
body_html: I think that this is null initially because by default the Preference Value is neither true nor false.
